item.title: Azure Functions – Real-world example using Event Grid Trigger with PowerShell
item.description: Introduction Of late, I got an exciting task. Yes, it’s not challenging but requires a pinch of concentration. The requirement is to copy files from the source storage account to multiple destinations (storage accounts). Why? Infrastructure is designed and developed to sync few JSON files from master (management) subscriptions to all other subscriptions. Yes, it is not easy to follow the theory.
